body:
All Versions

  • Rank Networks: Enhanced export to send email notification instead of forcing user to wait on the page until the export is finished.
  • Email: Made changes to email infrastructure to minimize the likelihood that application emails will be marked as spam by major email providers.

Network360 Only

  • Compare Networks: Fixed bug that caused the base network to show up with a ranking of 0 on the list tab of the Relative Strength detail page.
  • Compare Networks: Fixed bug that prevented Network Strength map from being colorized for certain geographies.
  • Compare Networks: Fixed bug that allowed low quality address scores to appear on the volatility detail page map.
  • Compare Networks and Create List Details: Fixed bug that caused provider drops detail pages to return no results when custom geography selected.
  • Create List Export: Fixed bug that prevented exclusive and overlap provider detail pages from being exported.

Network360edge Only

  • Assess Markets: Fixed bug that prevented report from downloading in certain versions of Internet Explorer.
